AdMobExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Constructs an @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#admob#AdMobExtras_E@ with the provided extra ad request parameters.

getExtras().Description: Returns the extra ad request parameters.

ClassDesc: Instead of using this class in conjunction with @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#Builder#addNetworkExtras_E@, pass a Bundle to @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#AdRequest#Builder#addNetworkExtrasBundle_E@ along with com.google.ads.mediation.admob.AdMobAdapter.class. @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#NetworkExtras_E@ for the AdMob mediation adapter. This class is deprecated.
